title: There isn't any single service centre in india ,I request u to plZ etiblished one
content:
Sir I'm looking for Google accessories and service centre but still I didn't find any ,coz u didn't established one ,so sir PLZZ I requested u to build a service centre in india so we can repair our phone here and buy gunine accessories from Google store coz right I'm not sure that the accessories I bought from Flipkart is real or fake 


Sir many people in my country love Google phone but due to lack of services and accessories many hesitate to buy pixel phone 

Please sir , try to open Google store in india where we can buy gunine Google accessories and repair our phone 

Thanx for reading sir
